Question: Let Reema have '$x$' minutes time to complete $15$ tasks. If Reema decides to give equal time for each task, then each task has to done in $15$ minutes. Select correct operation to solve for '$x$'.
Solution_text:
Reema had '$x$' minutes to perform $15$ tasks. Each task has to be done in $15$ minutes.
We want to find '$x$'
Therefore we write ,
$( x \div 15 ) = 15 $
$( x \div 15 ) \times 15 = 15 \times 15$ ,by multiplying $15$ on both sides

Question: Let Sam have '$y$' litres of honey. Sam fills honey in $11$ bottles of $10$ litre volume. Select correct operation to solve for '$y$'.
Solution_text:
Sam had $'y'$ litres of honey which will fill
into $11$ bottles of $10$ litre volume.
We want to find '$y$'
Therefore we write ,
$( y \div 11 ) = 10 $
$( y \div 11 ) \times 11 = 10 \times 11$ ,by multiplying $11$ on both sides
